name: Juiced
content:
script:
  files:
  - installer: N/A:Select the game's setup file
  game:
    arch: win64
    exe: $GAMEDIR/Juiced.exe
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    working_dir: $GAMEDIR
  installer:
  - task:
      arch: win32
      description: Creating Wine Prefix...
      name: create_prefix
      prefix: $GAMEDIR
  - task:
      app: nocrashdialog
      arch: win32
      description: Hiding crash dialogs...
      name: winetricks
      prefix: $GAMEDIR
      silent: 'true'
  - task:
      arch: win32
      description: Setting version to xp...
      key: Version
      name: set_regedit
      path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
      prefix: $GAMEDIR
      value: winxp
  - task:
      arch: win32
      executable: installer
      name: wineexec
      prefix: $GAMEDIR
  wine:
    Desktop: true
    WineDesktop: 1024x768
